1. Data Loading and Cleaning
# Question 1: Load the Public Profit and Emission Database (Google Spreadsheet) and OWID CO2 Dataset. Provide a summary of the datasets, including variables and their data types.

```{python}
import pandas as pd

# Load Public Profit and Emission Database
profit_emission_url = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19MQbZbrCu4HpAWe6NU92CioYQ7KE8FvD9vl-r9qSjJg/export?format=csv"
profit_emission_data = pd.read_csv(profit_emission_url)

# Load OWID CO2 Dataset
owid_co2_url = "https://github.com/owid/co2-data/raw/master/owid-co2-data.csv"
owid_co2_data = pd.read_csv(owid_co2_url)

# Load CarbonPlan CDR Database
cdr_url = "https://carbonplan.org/research/cdr-database/methods/cdr_data.csv"
cdr_data = pd.read_csv(cdr_url)

# Display dataset summaries
print("Public Profit and Emission Database:")
print(profit_emission_data.info())
print("\nOWID CO2 Dataset:")
print(owid_co2_data.info())
```
